commit.title: Make the iago-echo example use scala 2.10.3
Remove race condition from timeout test and add explicit state check
Update tests to verify feeder shutdown on timeout and max requests limit
Wait indefinitely for server shutdown to avoid common TimeoutExceptions while server queue is drained
Use new Travis CI container infrastructure
Remove extra cell in configuration table
Default maxRequests to Integer.MAX_VALUE rather than 1000 to allow it to be used in combination with duration
Resolve transitive dependency conflict for commons-codec by explicitly declaring in iago parent pom
Just a small fix on README
Added PUT support.  Request body supported added for PUT as it will contain a newly-updated representation of an original resource or even possibly a new resource.
Use single brackets instead of double in common.sh
didn't realize package-dist was not release so including a copy here
put back maven assembly logic so "mvn package" and "mvn install" create distributions as advertised
removed com.twitter:maven-build-properties-plugin:0.0.2 dependency as it was never published and isn't used by Iago anyway
merging scala-parent-292-0.1.6.pom, since it was never published
updating example pom to use latest iago & scrooge
attempt to get https and extra logging working
fixing formatting. Also - this info is just a copy of messages in the user group. Putting them in the readme to make it more accessible.
Updating readme with some more details about stats; adding links to Raggiana
updating finagle to latest, to see if that cures Iago's tendency to get stuck if any requests timeout
fix to ensure config.recordProcessor.start() gets called
Forget to specifiy the record processor in examples/web
provide an example of Iago stress testing a conventional web server
more diagnostics in EndToEndSpec for flapper in Travis
fixed documenation hyperlinks. Added FinagleService & RefCountedService
honor timeouts, shutdown differently for timouts vs EOF
fix port and more files from internal
Change port to match echo server configuration.
fixes UDP test to not call stop twice.
Clarifies requestRate's interaction with multiple server instances
Fix a couple of config doc mistakes.
Maybe that advice about how to configure belongs in the configuring section
add some material to "Services" section. Links to Transport class' source
fix things that tripped me up while learning Parrot
Updating to latest Util / Finagle / Ostrich
upgrade the version of finagle, util & ostrich to current
Minor target change for sample load generator
need a bit of a delay so the server definitely comes up before feeder
implemented kill, so at least there's cleanup

issues.title: mvn package failing on echo example
Unit tests failure - Error shutting down Parrot: com.twitter.util.TimeoutException
Iago distribution is no longer created
Examples page is blank and has 404s
Iago is not published to any Maven repositiories
Iago does not always shut down
